title: Live on Chesnut Ave!
description: Move in ASAP! A great private bedroom with private bathroom. Close to downtown and Trader Joes. Looking for a quiet roommate
features: Within walking distance of Trader Joes
Exposed brickwork retaining the charm of the existing building
details: Have a single room available in a beautiful home with a great clean, kind, considerate roommate! Includes large room, outdoor space, deck, washer, dryer, walking distance to samba rock, starbucks, and downtown! Biking distance to the beach! Great location! Large garage with tons of storage space!
